article_node.title: Word of the Day: gulag
article_node.summary: The article discusses the usage of the word 'gulag' in various contexts, particularly highlighting its appearance in a New York Times piece about actor Jon Bernthal's experiences in Russian theater. Bernthal's teachers, who risked imprisonment during the Soviet era, exemplify the dangers associated with artistic expression at that time. The article also encourages readers to creatively use the word 'gulag' in sentences, linking to vocabulary quizzes and usage examples.
